text: Contraindications to liver transplant Absolute « Fulminant acute or subacute hepatic failure- sustained A ICP or CPP (recipient too unstable) + Compensated cirrhosis with no complications - Child-Pugh A or MELD <15 « Severe cardiac or pulmonary disease + Uncontrolled sepsis including biliary sepsis + Ongoing alcohol or substance abuse - Exirahepatic malignancy « Hepatocellular carcinoma with vascular invasion/metastatic spread - AIDS + Anatomical abnormalities that preclude liver fransplantation « Persistent noncompliance/lack of psychosocial support
